description: This file initializes a web application called Ocean Notes by mounting a Lightning.js App component onto the DOM. It loads external dependencies, creates fallback UI during load, handles different API versions of the Blits library for launching the app, and manages UI cleanup after startup.

methods.name: Document event listener callback
methods.description: Main logic that executes when DOM content is loaded; initializes the app, creates fallback UI, manages loading overlays, and styles the canvas element.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Removes overlays and fallback elements after the app starts or if loading fails, ensuring a clean DOM state.
